About

I’m a sofware engineer from Greece, currently living in London and working at Sohonet. I have a Master’s degree in engineering from the National Technical University of Athens. I currently write Python at work, but outside of work I write mostly Haskell. I am interested in writing good software, algorithms, type theory and of course Emacs. By night, I’m also a jazz guitarist.

You can find me at github, twitter, reddit and by email at alexpeitsinis [at] gmail [dot] com.
